Injustice:
 
"What do you want me to do, my lord?  Want me to track them down and bring them back?" the clone asked eagerly.  
He wanted to enjoy this, Malice wasn't going to be superior to him any longer.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Unicron:

"That's why I want to know, those renegades are a danger for... 
us"said Unicron"'cause They dissapered in odd circunstances I assume 
that athey just leave us. But I guess that they might be in Earth 
and with the conmotion of the cannon... will be dangerous to go 
there and find ut if they are there.."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Injustice:
>  
> "What?  You mean they're gone?  Where?  I want to slag'em once or 
twice!"  
> Injustice was trully suprised.  WHat was the world coming to?  
Minions didn't just up and leave.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Unicron:
> 
> "AHHH I see"said the hologram"Then you can't told me anything 
about 
> the dissapear of Malice, Hellplague and Blacknightmare,can you?"
